verses.name: 1 Kings 18:4
verses.text: For it was so, when Jezebel cut off the prophets of the Lord, that Obadiah took an hundred prophets, and hid them by fifty in a cave, and fed them with bread and water.)

verses.name: 1 Kings 18:5
verses.text: And Ahab said unto Obadiah, Go into the land, unto all fountains of water, and unto all brooks: peradventure we may find grass to save the horses and mules alive, that we lose not all the beasts.

verses.name: 1 Kings 18:6
verses.text: So they divided the land between them to pass throughout it: Ahab went one way by himself, and Obadiah went another way by himself.
